text.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - Major Arcana Slave!!!
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies (max 3 allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([[Charge]] - 1) Atk Weight (max 3)

[EndSkill] Consume all [[Charge]] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([[Charge]] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max 5%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn

text.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - Major Arcana Slave!!!
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies (max 3 allies)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], apply 2 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies instead (max 3 allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([[Charge]] - 1) Atk Weight (max <style="highlight">5)
[EndSkill] Consume all [[Charge]] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([[Charge]] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max <style="highlight">8%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn

text.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - Major Arcana Slave!!!
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / <style="highlight">2)) random other allies (max <style="highlight">4 allies)
- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], apply 2 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / <style="highlight">2)) random other allies instead (max <style="highlight">4 allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([[Charge]] - 1) Atk Weight (max 5)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], gain +([[Charge]]) Atk Weight instead (max 5)

[EndSkill] Consume all [[Charge]] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([[Charge]] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max <style="highlight">10%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], inflict +1 [Burst] Count

passiveList.name: Arcana Aptitude Circuit
passiveList.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count
- If this unit already gains [Charge] by consuming [Charge] Count on self, this effect does not stack with that effect
- This unit's Base Attack Skills that consume [Charge] Count: deal +5% damage for every [Charge] on self (max 25%)

If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 additional Skill 3 use

text.name: Maximized Reversed Arcana Slave - Erasure of Hatred
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +([[Charge]]) Atk Weight (max 5)

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [[Charge]] Count and deal +1% more damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max 20%)

[BeforeAttack] If the main target has [VillainMark], deal +3% damage for every [[Charge]] (max 15%)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +5% damage for every 3 Envy Reson. (max 10%, rounded down)

[BeforeAttack] Base Power -12 for every Cracked Coin (max -24)

[EndSkill] If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [HystericGauge]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn

Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +([[Charge]]) Atk Weight (max 5)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [NoVillain], gain +([[Charge]] + 1) Atk Weight instead (max 5)

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [[Charge]] Count and deal +<style="highlight">2% more damage for every [[Charge]] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">40%)

[BeforeAttack] If the main target has [VillainMark], deal +<style="highlight">5% damage for every [[Charge]] (max <style="highlight">25%)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [HystericGauge], deal +7% damage for every [[Charge]] instead (max 35%)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +<style="highlight">7% damage for every 2 Envy Reson. (max <style="highlight">21%, rounded down)

[BeforeAttack] Base Power -12 for every Cracked Coin (max -24)

[EndSkill] If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [HystericGauge]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn
